last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10
last_episode_to_air.overview: Dizzying revelations force Yoann to rethink everything about the case -- and push him ever closer to the brink.

name: The Break
overview: The story is set in a small village in the Ardennes, where a young African footballer is found dead. If all clues lead first to suicide, a police officer just arrived from Brussels does not take long to discover that this is a murder.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview:
Four years have passed since the Driss Assani case. Yoann Peeters has moved, he's not a cop anymore. He tries to take some distance in an attempt to forget the tragic death of Sebastian Drummer. But his past catches up on him quickly.

Jasmina Orban, the psychologist who took care of him back in the day, comes back to find him. She's working with a new patient : Dany Bastin, a young man on probation. He is accused of a horrible crime, but she is convinced he's innocent. Yoann is the only person who can help her. But he's reluctant, he promised himself he would never investigate again...

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Inspector Yoann Peeters and his daughter Camille move to Heiderfeld where he spend his youth. when a boy ends up dead in the river, Peeters is the only one who believes there is more to it than a suicide.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: With a confession on the books, the chief is eager to close the case. But, Peeters presses ahead, convinced the real killer is still at large.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Flouting orders, Peeters hatches a plan to find out what the Malausas are hiding. Camile gets her first taste of the local party scene.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: As Peeters puzzles over a disturbing find at Driss's apartment, the mystery caller gives the mayor an ultimatum, and Camile worries for Zoe's safety.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Peeters digs into shady dealings at the soccer club and braces for a difficult conversation with Ines. The chief closes in on the menacing caller.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Jeff leads Peeters and Drummer to a chilling scene in the woods. The battle over the dam takes a new turn, and Camile's frustrations boil over.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: While Peeters questions the author of the fake suicide note, the chief makes an unsettling discovery. Panic sends Kevin into a dangerous spiral.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The mystery about Driss, Heiderfeld and Yoann unravels further more. Yoann finally hears why his psychiatrist is questioning him.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Romantic revelations and news of a local's dark past shake up the investigation once again. When Sebastian goes AWOL, Marjo faces a dilemma.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: As memories come flooding back to Peeters, the pieces of the puzzle begin to fall into place. But he can't shake the feeling that something is amiss.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When a patient with a troubled past is accused of killing a baroness, Dr. Orban turns to Yoann Peeters for help. But he's reluctant to get involved.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Yoann starts asking questions about the 2009 murder after Dany's shrink asks for help because she thinks he served time for a murder he didn't commit.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Yoann finds evidence that Dany confessed under duress. Additional evidence is uncovered about the hours leading up to Astrid du Tilleul's murder. Yoann speaks to a doctor who was treating Astrid. Claudine is making plans for her new found wealth.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Claudine surprises Tino with a gift. Dinner with the neighbors proves unsettling for Yoann and Camille. Tensions flare among the squatters in the woods.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A new detail about the murder scene outs Yoann on the hunt for a mysterious art collective. Dany's theft gets him in trouble in prison.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The day of Myriam's show, Camille and Yoann each make alarming discoveries. Karim and Marjo investigate the break in at du Tilleul's home.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: A call from Dany sends Jasmina racing to the prison, but someone else gets there first. When police clear the camp, Boris and Pierrot drop in on Tino.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Convinced that Coralie holds the key to solving the case, Yoann goes to extremes to find out what she saw. Karim scrambles to cover up a mistake.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Marjo takes a big step, a re-energized Yoann turns his attention to another suspect, and Jasmina realizes Dany may know more than he's letting on.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Dizzying revelations force Yoann to rethink everything about the case -- and push him ever closer to the brink.

2.name: Season 2

Jasmina Orban, the psychologist who took care of him back in the day, comes back to find him. She's working with a new patient : Dany Bastin, a young man on probation. He is accused of a horrible crime, but she is convinced he's innocent. Yoann is the only person who can help her. But he's reluctant, he promised himself he would never investigate again...
